channel.title: Gaming on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on FinanClub

item.title: RBLX
item.description: score:153 Chances: Roblox stock has cleared a buy point following a bullish Wall Street call. RBLX stock has been on a strong recent run, rising around 74%. Wells Fargo initiates coverage of the gaming platform Roblox (RBLX) with an “Overweight” rating on the stock and a price target of $49 per share.

item.title: SE
item.description: score:208 Chances: Sea Ltd. is a diversified internet and mobile platform company with strong growth potential in its Digital Entertainment, E-Commerce, and Digital Financial Services segments. The company’s E-Commerce segment, Shopee, has the potential for significant growth as it connects buyers and sellers in a third-party marketplace.
